snippet: The blast struck a military convoy 20 miles east of Parachinar, the capital of the Kurram tribal district, said a military official who declined to be named.
lead_paragraph: The blast struck a military convoy 20 miles east of Parachinar, the capital of the Kurram tribal district, said a military official who declined to be named.

headline.seo: Roadside Bomb Kills Soldiers in Pakistan Tribal District
headline.main: Roadside Bomb Kills 3 Soldiers in Pakistan Tribal District
headline.print_headline: Roadside Bomb Kills 3 Soldiers in Pakistan Tribal District
